column1: Overall I am satisfied with the module
The module is well organised and is running smoothly
I have been given sufficient information and guidance about this module
Any changes in the module or teaching have been communicated effectively
I have been able to contact a member of the teaching team when I needed to
The teaching on this module has been good
The module has stimulated my interest in the field of study
The assessments and marking criteria set for this module are clear
Feedback on my work in this module has been on time (within four weeks)
Feedback on my work in this module has shown me how to improve and build on my strengths
There are good learning resources available to support the module
